name: Puppet-bootstrap
body:
# puppet-bootstrap
Install script for puppet agents, tested on FreeBSD 10.{1,2} and CentOS 7.

### Usage
```bash
bash install.sh
```

### Options
Edit installer/configs/global/install.conf to pass certificate timeout and puppet master server options to the script.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
